Hi!

> 
> Do you need to weave aspects into your test code, or just your 
> production code? If possible, I recommend weaving aspects /only/
into 
> your production code. (This is a general recommendation and not just
one 
> way to deal with your difficulty.)

Could you explain this recommendation a bit further? 
In my design aspects represent some features, so each time I provide a
feature to my base code I want to provide test cases for it to my test
suits. It helps me keep features(components) pluggable. 

Greetings
Andrzej Krzywda
